Greatsword Two-Handed

Svartlebee's Woundseeker is one of the Greatsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Svartlebee's Woundseeker is magic sword the adds a bonus to attack rolls when hitting an enemy that was already hurt. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
